Title: ~Hack~ Metal Sonic Rebooted
RichPresencePatch:
Format:Value
FormatType=VALUE

Lookup:Stage
0x0000=🌃Lethal Harbor 1
0x0001=🌃Lethal Harbor 2
0x0a00=🔥Magma Factory 1
0x0a01=🔥Magma Factory 2
0x0f00=🌳Forbidden Ruins 1
0x0f01=🌳Forbidden Ruins 2
0x0800=💧Neo Utopia 1
0x0801=💧Neo Utopia 2
0x0b00=🏜️Cryptic Desert 1
0x0b01=🏜️Cryptic Desert 2
0x0c00=🎰Twinkle Slider 1
0x0c01=🎰Twinkle Slider 2
0x0700=🌲Dark Jungle 1
0x0701=🌲Dark Jungle 2
0x0400=⚙️Iron Abyss 1
0x0401=⚙️Iron Abyss 2
0x0500=⚙️Iron Abyss 3
0x0d00=🌌Orbital Colony
0x0e00=🤖Final Act

Lookup:StageSelect
0x00=🌃Lethal Harbor 1
0x01=🌃Lethal Harbor 2
0x02=🔥Magma Factory 1
0x03=🔥Magma Factory 2
0x04=🌳Forbidden Ruins 1
0x05=🌳Forbidden Ruins 2
0x06=🎰Twinkle Slider 1
0x07=🎰Twinkle Slider 2
0x08=💧Neo Utopia 1
0x09=💧Neo Utopia 2
0x0a=🏜️Cryptic Desert 1
0x0b=🏜️Cryptic Desert 2
0x0c=🌲Dark Jungle 1
0x0d=🌲Dark Jungle 2
0x0e=⚙️Iron Abyss 1
0x0f=⚙️Iron Abyss 2
0x10=⚙️Iron Abyss 3
0x11=🌌Orbital Colony
0x12=🤖Final Act
0x13=✨Special Stage
0x14=🎵Sound Test

Lookup:Difficulty
0x00=Normal
0x01=Hard

Lookup:MainMenu
0x00=Start
0x01=Options

Lookup:Options
0x00=Difficulty
0x01=Random Items
0x02=Sound test

Lookup:RandomItems
0x00=Off
0x01=On

Lookup:Char
0x00=Metal Sonic
0x01=Knuckles

Lookup:Super
0x00=
0x01=Super 

Display:
?0xH00ffd3=1?The debug mode is on, reset the game to continue earning achievements.
?0xH00f601=0?SEGA
?O:0x00f601=H8c_0x00f601=Hc?Demo
?0xH00f601=8?Lone Devil presents
?0xH00f601=4?Metal Sonic Rebooted ・ @MainMenu(0xH00ff87)
?0xH00f601=H2c_0xH00ff82=H14?Select Stage ・ @StageSelect(0xH00ff82): @Value(0xH00ff84)
?0xH00f601=H2c?Select Stage ・ @StageSelect(0xH00ff82)
?0xH00f601=H28_0xH00ff8d=0?⚙️Options ・ @Options(0xH00ff8d): @Difficulty(0xH00ff72)
?0xH00f601=H28_0xH00ff8d=1?⚙️Options ・ @Options(0xH00ff8d): @RandomItems(0xH00ff74)
?0xH00f601=H28_0xH00ff8d=2?⚙️Options ・ @Options(0xH00ff8d): @Value(0xH00ff84)
?0xb006=H4afc?✨Special Stage ◎@Value(A:0xH00b07d*100_A:0xH00b07c*10_A:0xH00b07f*1_A:0xH00b03d*100_A:0xH00b03c*10_M:0xH00b03f*1)/@Value(0x00db8c)💎@Value(0xH00fe17)/7
?0xH00fe25<Ha_0xH00ffaa=0?@Super(0xH00fe18)@Char(0xH00ffaa) @Stage(0x00fe10) ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):0@Value(0xH00fe25) 💙@Value(0xH00fe13) ◎@Value(0x00fe20) 💎@Value(0xH00fe17)/7 ⚖️@Difficulty(0xH00ff72)
?0xH00fe25>=Ha_0xH00ffaa=0?@Super(0xH00fe18)@Char(0xH00ffaa) @Stage(0x00fe10) ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):@Value(0xH00fe25) 💙@Value(0xH00fe13) ◎@Value(0x00fe20) 💎@Value(0xH00fe17)/7 ⚖️@Difficulty(0xH00ff72)
?0xH00fe25<Ha_0xH00ffaa=1?@Super(0xH00fe18)@Char(0xH00ffaa) @Stage(0x00fe10) ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):0@Value(0xH00fe25) ❤️@Value(0xH00fe13) ◎@Value(0x00fe20) ⚖️@Difficulty(0xH00ff72)
?0xH00fe25>=Ha_0xH00ffaa=1?@Super(0xH00fe18)@Char(0xH00ffaa) @Stage(0x00fe10) ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):@Value(0xH00fe25) ❤️@Value(0xH00fe13) ◎@Value(0x00fe20) ⚖️@Difficulty(0xH00ff72)
Metal Sonic Rebooted

Achievements.Title: Knuckles Challenge #7
Achievements.Description: Finish Twinkle Slider - Act 1 without: use any monitor, taking hit and collect ring. (Stage select allowed, except 1-up, random: off)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Metal Sonic Challenge #4
Achievements.Description: Beat the boss in Neo Utopia - Act 2 carrying the bomb, without invincibility, super mode and 2P joystick in the boss area. (Stage select allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Metal Sonic Challenge #5
Achievements.Description: Beat the boss in Cryptic Desert - Act 2 carrying the bomb, without invincibility, super mode and 2P joystick in the boss area. (Stage select allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Metal Sonic Challenge #6
Achievements.Description: Beat the boss in Twinkle Slider - Act 2 carrying the bomb, without invincibility, super mode and 2P joystick in the boss area. (Stage select allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Metal Sonic Challenge #7
Achievements.Description: Beat the boss in Dark Jungle - Act 2 carrying the bomb, without invincibility, super mode and 2P joystick in the boss area. (Stage select allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Metal Sonic Challenge #8
Achievements.Description: Beat the boss in Iron Abyss - Act 2 carrying the bomb, without invincibility, super mode and 2P joystick in the boss area. (Stage select allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Description: Beat the boss in Iron Abyss - Act 3 carrying the bomb, without invincibility, super mode and 2P joystick in the boss area. (Stage select allowed)

Achievements.Description: Finish the whole Lethal Harbor - Act 2 without: taking hit, pressing left, invincibility usage and super mode. (Stage select allowed, random: off)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Description: Finish Magma Factory - Act 1 without: use any monitor, taking hit and collect ring. (Stage select allowed, except 1-up, random: off)

Achievements.Description: Finish Forbidden Ruins - Act 1 without: use any monitor, taking hit, and collect more than 1 ring. (Stage select allowed, except 1-up, random: off)

Achievements.Description: Get more rings with the Bomb on the first third of the Special stage 1. (2P prohibited)

Achievements.Title: Overheat
Achievements.Description: Activate the overclocked mode at the beginning of Lethal Harbor - Act 2, then finish the act. (1st camera position, Select stage code: off)
